review_data.title: Reasonable pizza, but unfriendly restaurant
review_data.content: Don Leone at Waffenplatzstrasse is a frequently visited restaurant in the southern part of Zürich. While the pizzas are reasonable, the service is fairly slow, even over lunchtime, not overly polite and friendly. Moreover, throughout the restaurant it stinks because it has no meaningful ventilation.
